WakeLockSentinelType.summary: The type read-only property of the interface returns a string representation of the currently acquired type.

remarks.para: -Stay awake with the Screen Wake Lock API

WakeLockSentinelType.value:
A string representation of the currently acquired wake lock type.
Currently, the value is always screen, which represents a screen wake lock.
It prevents devices from dimming or locking the screen.
